api_list.api_description: Retrieve information on a specific venue by ID.

required_parameters.name: id
required_parameters.description: ID of the venue to be returned.

api_list.api_description: Retrieve the order book for a specified instrument.

required_parameters.name: inst_id
required_parameters.description: The instrument ID for which the order book is required.

query: I want detailed information on a specific venue by its ID and also the order book details for Ethereum against USD on OKX.
